root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 5-2-1, translated into en
root.data: Percentage of women and girls aged 15 years and older who have experienced violence by their current or former husband or partner in the past 12 months is the percentage of women and girls aged 15 years and older who have experienced experienced physical, sexual or emotional violence by a current or former husband or partner in the past 12 months compared to the total number of women and girls aged 15 years and older.
